title: Sandler Sales Training Presidents Club Training CDs
description:
This torrent has all of the CDs from Sandler Sales Training's "President's Club," which is the core sales training product. If you're looking for sales training, I highly recommend Sandler's methods. I don't have the book that came along with the President's Club package--it disappeared in my last move. The audio sessions go through a logical progression of general to specific: first discussion of the technique and the rationale behind it, then examples. This makes it easy to adapt the techniques and scripts to your industry. I also included a couple of graphics that were not on the audio CDs that will help you.

Please note that I can seed this fairly reliably between midnight and 7:00a.m. (US East Coast time / New York City time / GMT minus 5). I can seed at other times, sporadically, and those times depend on what other work I need to do and whether my ISP decides to throttle.
